brandedDesc: Empowering Gazan Talent Through Connection: Taqat bridges the gap between capable (protected)s and businesses in need. Explore new opportunities, create new teams, and rebuild your career through Taqat’s ever-expanding platform.
signupTitle: Join The Taqat Ecosystem And Explore A More Connected Freelance Future.
signinTitle: New Opportunities Await: Pick Up Where You Left Off!
name: Name
resetDesc: Enter your email to receive a password reset link.
codeHolder: Enter the code that was sent to your email
siginupAlertSuccess: You have successfully signed up! Please check your email to verify your account and then

acceptRequired: You must accept the terms and conditions.
